quotes.quote: Learn to say no in situations where saying no can be difficult, where it could mean getting fired. Say no anyway, because it could lead you to greater opportunities.
Saying no can be the ultimate self-care.
You don't have to accept things you are not okay with.
Learn to say no without explaining yourself.
Always say no pun intended to draw attention to the intended pun.
Tone is the hardest part of saying no.
Learning to "just say no" to emotional reactions isn't repression. Saying no means not engaging the frustration, anger, judgment, or blame. Without engagement, you won't have anything to repress.
If you want more time, freedom, and energy, start saying no.

In saying no to progress, it is not the future which they condemn, but themselves. They give themselves a melancholy disease; they inoculate themselves with the past. There is but one way of refusing tomorrow, that is to die.
You can't improve on saying nothing.
The ability to say no is a tremendous advantage for an investor.
There are times in life when language fails us, when everything that needs to be said can be expressed only by saying nothing at all.
There is nothing worse than doing nothing and saying nothing when your voice is needed.
Half of the troubles of this life can be traced to saying yes too quickly and not saying no soon enough.

Saying No gains you respect. When you say No, the other person may feel disappointed. But ultimately, they will respect you for taking good care of yourself. And most of all, you'll respect yourself because you are being true to yourself!
The courage to say no, the courage to say yes. Decisions do determine Destiny.

It takes effort to say no when our heart and brains and guts and, most important, pride are yearning to say yes. Practice.
When you say 'yes' to others, make sure you're not saying 'no' to yourself.
Coffee is a girl who never tells a boy no.
If you must say yes, say it with an open heart. If you must say no, say it without fear.
It's only by saying no that you can concentrate on the things that really matter.
